item.title: Vultr CLI and JSON output
item.description: I’ve begun exploring Vultr after the company announced a managed Kubernetes offering Vultr Kubernetes Engine (VKE). In my brief experience, it’s a decent platform and its CLI vultr-cli is mostly (!) good. The CLI has a limitation in that command output is text formatted and this makes it challenging to parse the output when scripting. NOTE The Vultr developers have a branch rewrite that includes a solution to this problem.
